author: first author
title: paper title
doi_or_url: Either the Digital Object Identifier if it's available or the paper's URL if it's not
intervention_condition: the specific intervention we're coding (useful for papers with multiple interventions)
brief_description: brief overview of the intervention (useful for when we're searching for a methodological keyword e.g. leaflet)
cluster_assigned: was treatment assigned individually or at the level of a cluster
n_c_post: sample size for the control group at posttest
n_t_post: sample size for the treatment group at pretest
eff_type: the effect type that we're using to calculate Glass's Delta
u_s_d: the unstandardized effect size that we're using to calculate Glass's Delta
ctrl_sd: standard deviation of the dependent variable for the control group
neg_null_pos: in the paper's own words were the results negative (backlash) null or positive
delay: time in days between the first administration of treatment and final outcome measurement
persuasion_category: for persuasion studies the specific theoretical content (animal welafre and/or environmental appeals and/or health)
country: what country(ies) did the study take pace in
population: what age group/setting did the study take place in
